bibl.title: From the World of Arabic Papyri. (Royal Society of Historical Studies.)
bibl.note: An introduction to Arabic papyrology and a selection of 88 texts (with translation).
Grohmann Adolf, From the World of Arabic Papyri. (Royal Society of Historical Studies.)
Cairo, al-Maaref Press, 1952, 8°, xxii-262 pp., 2 cartes, 10 figg., avec 16 pll. et 1 tabl. dépl.
